mapper.select: select * from car_schedule_table where start_time like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%') or end_time like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%') ORDER BY start_time
SELECT driver,count(driver) as count FROM `car_schedule_table` where car_number=#{param1} group by driver order by count desc
